author: ngharo
body:
Set the RPM digest algorithm to SHA256 when distribution target is Red Hat.

## PR Context

fpm is used to build the rpm package. By default, the rpm digest will use md5. md5 is _not_ FIPS compliant. If I specify sha256 as an option during the build I am able to install correctly.

Fixes #15866
